definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
to obey/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing wood and wind/☴/ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat

sentences.english: "Teaching" is to drink dishes in family education.
Later, the chef carve calligraphy and painting on the melon, and the dish becomes a famous Confucius Family dish.
sentences.chinese: 日後又在瓜皮刻上字畫，爲孔府菜一道名饌。

sentences.english: Go the wrong way to remember to love the wrong person to know how to let go.
sentences.chinese: 走錯了路饌要記得回頭愛錯了人要懂得放手。

sentences.english: Write reports which will details the problems and indicate corrective actions required to avoid future occurrences.
sentences.chinese: 饌寫問題報告和改正措施，以確保問題不在發生。

sentences.english: The festival is also a good time to sample some of the special dishes and sweets of Kyoto.
sentences.chinese: 這個慶典也是個一嘗京都佳饌和甜點的好機會。

sentences.english: She cooked her husband a delicious meal.
sentences.chinese: 她給丈夫煮了一餐美饌。

definition: to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art
(literary) to offer food and drinks/to entertain
